ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Digest Number 552
ygData.msgSnippet: I have fed 3 teenagers and have 2 more getting close so that is not a problem. Almost had me convinced until you mentioned the begging. Sorry we do not support
ygData.messageBody:
I have fed 3 teenagers and have 2 more getting close so that is not a problem.
Almost had me convinced until you mentioned the begging. Sorry we do not support beggars of any kind around here. Better luck next time...hehehe
 
----- Original Message -----
From: Dr Scurrilous PhD
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Wednesday, August 07, 2002 8:27 AM
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] Digest Number 552

You have not seen how much I can eat :P
good weekend
when the fridge gets low...
do I go shopping to buy food???
HELL NO!!! That would mean leaving my game :P  and I hate
doing that for work, but I want that new mega puter :P
So I order pizza.  3 pizzas on the average two day weekend.
However I have gotten smart :)  I try to make sure I gots
plenty of food middle of week on day that I head home from
work, so I do not have to buy pizza on weekend or threaten
my game time :P

and...
but pleazzzzzzzzz can I have my own account...
Then you can have more characters on those limited servers
:)
and I will help get you all kinds of good stuff :)
promise
and I wont beg from people you know...

--- Orion <orionv@...> wrote:
> Feeding you is not a problem but another EQ account?? I
> just don't think so....:>
>

>   adopt me

>   college that is
>   if you pay for it :P
>

> kids
